title: Please bring tribunal to OCE
body:
http://imgur.com/EQmQQ5j,pg3tO7M#1
http://imgur.com/EQmQQ5j,pg3tO7M#0

i have a smurf on OCE and the community is wayyy more toxic than on NA. so pweeze Rito, do something about the tribunal :(

replies.body:
I'm sorry you've had to go through some negative games. Don't think that just because there isn't a tribunal that nothing is being done!
Currently the Tribunal is down in all regions being upgraded!

Right now we have multiple automatic systems in place to punish negative behaviour; for example

Live

LeaverBuster
Chat restrictions
Intentional feeder bans
Manual audits

Currently testing

Automatic verbal abuse bans

This is of course just the negative stuff, we are also working on ways to promote and recognize positive play within our community as well!
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/celebrating-end-years-snowdown

Our player behavior philosophies include punishment, reform, and positive reinforcement. There's no silver bullet to improving player behavior in online games, and you always need a mix of punishments and rewards. You can read more about our design philosophies here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/exploring-player-behavior-design-values

If you're really interested in player behaviour give this video a watch it is Jeffrey "Lyte" Lin talking about "The Science Behind Shaping Player Behavior in Online Games".
http://gdcvault.com/play/1017940/The-Science-Behind-Shaping-Player

I like how they say that Riot doesn't ban people who spend money...
Because I have heard about a lot of people being pissed off that they lost an account which they spent hundreds of dollars on.

Well, there's two main conspiracy theories.
One, rito bans people after they've spent money so that they spend again.
Two, rito doesn't ban people if they spend enough money.

Sometimes it's fun to see the two collide.
It's probably something he convinces himself.

I really just wish there was more attention payed. I've had leavers, afkers, feeders, and general extreme negative attitudes and verbal harassment on both sides of the teams. It's not even necessarily directed at me, but it really affects game experience. I hardly encounter this in NA. Perhaps the difference of being a lv22 as opposed to a lv30 situated at about high gold-low plat in norms is that much..? Still feels like a foolhardy excuse at times.

I report in the vain hope that player behavior sweeps actually happen. For complete game wrecking %%%%kunts (as opposed to 12ies with low emotional intelligence ) i screenshot and write a support ticket. Probably wont do anything but even if it gets a pair of eyes looking at a perons match history to maybe get some disciplinary action cranking that is good enough for me.
NA doesn't have a tribunal, why should OCE? Also, they are doing something about the tribunal. Whether it will be beneficial once it's re-released is anyone's guess.

Disregarding the fact that it says 'Tribunal in Recess' Riot did state in an announcement a while ago that Tribunal was being removed from EVERY SERVER so they could 'update' it and that it would be re-released on every server (including OCE) once they had finished 'updating' it. Since then there has been no notice of how far through the supposed update they are or whether they are actually still working on it.

"Tribunal in Recess" {{champion:103}}

Pretty sure it was closed, waiting for updates.

Reports still do things, so just remember to do so.

It's just different people reading the reports now and takes longer to process.

> League of Legends is a big boy game and if you can't handle big boy words then maybe a big boy game isn't for you?

It's like saying Call of Duty is played by anyone else but twelvies.
99% is young little boyz  playing the game like you ... we dont need to see the writing  on the screen of a big whopper mouth we here to have fun     {{champion:36}}
